attributes.action: Oppose completely, any attempt to make the former Prime Minister, Tony Blair the President of the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During his Premiership, Blair proved himself unreliable as he totally mislead and misinformed the British people as he pursued a campaign against the Nation. Further he embroiled us in wars based entirely on proven lies. He is therefore, unworthy of the Presidency.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
